list.name: Default
list.comment: Added fieldconverter module! fieldconverter: methods to convert M to A to B magdata: a bit more parameters for quiver_plot3d(), added contour_plot3d() phasemapper: pm() extended for different projections (not just simple) kernel: u and v switched (now named after the unit magnetization direction, which makes much more sense)

console-settings.custom-start-script: # coding: utf-8 """Startup!""" from __future__ import division import sys import os import pdb import hyperspy.api as hs import pyramid from pyramid import * import pyramid.analytic as an import pyramid.magcreator as mc import pyramid.reconstruction as rc import jutil import numpy as np import scipy as sp import matplotlib as mpl import matplotlib.pyplot as plt from pylab import * import logging.config logging.config.fileConfig(LOGGING_CONFIG, disable_existing_loggers=False) ion() # Enable Matplotlib's interactive mode sys.path.extend([WORKING_DIR_AND_PYTHON_PATHS])

option.name: myCustomStartScript
option.value: # coding: utf-8 """Startup!""" from __future__ import division import sys import os import pdb import hyperspy.api as hs import pyramid from pyramid import * import pyramid.analytic as an import pyramid.magcreator as mc import pyramid.reconstruction as rc import jutil import numpy as np import scipy as sp import matplotlib as mpl import matplotlib.pyplot as plt from pylab import * import logging.config logging.config.fileConfig(LOGGING_CONFIG, disable_existing_loggers=False) ion() # Enable Matplotlib's interactive mode sys.path.extend([WORKING_DIR_AND_PYTHON_PATHS])

task.summary: First use of PyCharms! Added .idea folder with PyCharms settings. Changed icon.ico (now round). PhaseMap and MagData: Now use h5py to load/save data (via HyperSpy). Deprecated loading routines (x3d) are gone now! tests: All tests now reflect this change. scripts: Streamlined some scripts. Many are now in separate project: Script-Vault
Added old backup copies (sort out in future)!
Hopefully made hyperspy import (now at beginning of pyramid package) work! Added PyCharm files! Commit before Reformatting with PyCharms!
Hopefully made hyperspy import (now at beginning of pyramid package) work! Added PyCharm files! Commit before Reformatting with PyCharms!
New branch: new signals for holographic analysis!

MESSAGE.value: First use of PyCharms! Added .idea folder with PyCharms settings. Changed icon.ico (now round). PhaseMap and MagData: Now use h5py to load/save data (via HyperSpy). Deprecated loading routines (x3d) are gone now! tests: All tests now reflect this change. scripts: Streamlined some scripts. Many are now in separate project: Script-Vault
Added more signals for holographic imaging!
Added old backup copies (sort out in future)!
Hopefully made hyperspy import (now at beginning of pyramid package) work! Added PyCharm files! Commit before Reformatting with PyCharms!
New branch: new signals for holographic analysis!

Added fieldconverter module! fieldconverter: methods to convert M to A to B magdata: a bit more parameters for quiver_plot3d(), added contour_plot3d() phasemapper: pm() extended for different projections (not just simple) kernel: u and v switched (now named after the unit magnetization direction, which makes much more sense)
